name: Number of sessions for the past 28 days
description: Analysis of the traffic created over the past month can be compared to the previous reports to reflect trends and improve the website. A result of 0 sessions created over the past month indicates a technical issue or a faulty measurement of the data.

blocks.description: Check if there are any sessions in the last 28 days
blocks.failHowtofix: Check, if the GA code is triggered on the website.
